titleInfo.title: On children's quantitative concept of rational number: construct and estimate the sum

Proceedings of the fifth annual meeting: Montréal Sept. 29 - Oct. 1, 1983 = actes de la cinquième rencontre annuelle / PME-NA, North American Chapter of the International Group for the Psychology of Mathematics Education
